### Exercise 2

```{r}
mets <- Teams %>% 
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets %>% 
  dplyr::filter(yearID %in% 2004:2012)
my_mets %>% 
  dplyr::select(yearID, G, W, L)

```

### Exercise 3

```{r}
mets_ben <- Teams %>% 
  dplyr::select(yearID, teamID,G, R, RA) %>%
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN" & yearID %in% 2004:2012)
mets_ben
```

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben %>% 
  dplyr::rename(Rs = R)    # new name = old name
mets_ben
```

### Exercise 4

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(WPct =  1 / (1 + (RA/Rs)*2))
mets_ben
```

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
  dplyr::mutate(W_hat = WPct*(W+L))
mets_ben
```
